means: <正，褒>（尤指女人的身材或腿）样子好的，匀称的

sentence.Network_en: The still water of the lake mirrored the shapely figure of the mountain.
sentence.Network_cn: 平静的湖水映出山的优美轮廓.

sentence.Network_en: Her large shapely body seemed to relapse naturally into stillness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的体态动人的高大身子似乎自然而然地陷于静止了.

sentence.Network_en: The cedar was about five feet high and very shapely.
sentence.Network_cn: 那棵雪松约有五尺高,风姿优美.

entry.tran: (女子)体形匀称的，有曲线美的
entry.def: If you describe a woman as shapely, you mean that she has an attractive shape.

means.word_mean: 1. having a well-proportioned and pleasing shape;
